column4: I was messing around earlier trying to repair my openoffice install and I messed something up.
when I run apt-get update I get a bunch of errors
specifically, when I run apt-get update it tells me it couldn't stat source package
I'm going to restart x and see if that helps... thanks for everything
not apt-get dist-upgrade, but I did get the other two... sad thing is apt-get update tells me to run apt-get update
haha yup, you have a bad repository
comment out ones that aren't legit for now
when you run apt-get update, it loads a list of the stuff on the websites listed in that file
but if one of those sites are bad, then the entire thing will complain
yeah, you know how to do that?
apt-get dist-upgrade, although I doubt that will do anything
did you comment out the wine repository?
I don't have any wine repositories lised
highlight, and then middleclick where you want pasted
